name: Sudokuban (Crow Seeds)
description: I thought of a dumb pun by combining Sudoku, a number grid puzzle, and Sokoban, a genre of video game where you push boxes. Made in one day for "Mini Jam #71: Puzzles" where you had to make a puzzle game utilizing two genres but I didn't realize until after making the game that Sudoku and Sokoban count as the same genre.... so uh..... whoops.
